p: Therefore, it is urgent to develop a mathematical model to estimate the transmissibility and dynamic of the transmission of the virus. There were several researches focusing on mathematical modelling [ 3, 8]. These researches focused on calculating the basic reproduction number ( R 0) by using the serial intervals and intrinsic growth rate [ 3, 9, 10], or using ordinary differential equations and Markov Chain Monte Carlo methods [ 8]. However, the bat origin and the transmission route form the seafood market to people were not considered in the published models.
